text: Tepidibacillus fermentans is a Gram-positive, moderately thermophilic, spore- forming and motile bacterium from the genus of Tepidibacillus which has been isolated from an underground gas storage in Severo-Stavropolskoye in Russia. ==References== == External links == *Type strain of Tepidibacillus fermentans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Tepidibacillus fermentans
